problem.markdown:
>>Which three file formats are valid input for queries From File?<<
[x] Excel file [x] CSV file [x] XML file [ ] BMP file
[explanation] BMP files are not valid input for Excel queries. [explanation]
problem.p: Which three file formats are valid input for queries From File?

checkboxgroup.label: Which three file formats are valid input for queries From File?

div.p: BMP files are not valid input for Excel queries.
